info.title: MyWallet API
info.description: Personal finance management system with subscription tracking

get.description:
Get user information by ID

Args:
    user_id: User ID
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    User information
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if user not found

List all asset accounts for a user

Args:
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of assets

schema.title: Response List Assets Api Assets Get

post.description:
Create a new asset account

Args:
    asset_data: Asset creation data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Created asset

get.description:
Get total assets for a user

Args:
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Total asset value

Get a specific asset by ID

Args:
    asset_id: Asset ID
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Asset information
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if asset not found

put.description:
Update an asset account

Args:
    asset_id: Asset ID
    asset_data: Asset update data
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Updated asset
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if asset not found

delete.description:
Delete an asset account

Args:
    asset_id: Asset ID
    db: Database session
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if asset not found

post.description:
Create a new subscription

Args:
    subscription_data: Subscription creation data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Created subscription

get.description:
List all subscriptions for a user with optional status filter

Args:
    status: Status filter (optional)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of subscriptions

schema.title: Response List Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Get

get.description:
Get a specific subscription by ID

Args:
    subscription_id: Subscription ID
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Subscription information
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if subscription not found

put.description:
Update a subscription

Args:
    subscription_id: Subscription ID
    subscription_data: Subscription update data
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Updated subscription
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if subscription not found

delete.description:
Delete a subscription

Args:
    subscription_id: Subscription ID
    db: Database session
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if subscription not found

post.description:
Create a new transaction

Args:
    transaction_data: Transaction creation data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Created transaction

get.description:
List all transactions for a user with optional filters

Args:
    category: Category filter (optional)
    subscription_id: Subscription ID filter (optional)
    start_date: Start date filter (optional)
    end_date: End date filter (optional)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of transactions

parameters.name: category

schema.description: Filter by category (subscription, food, salary, other)
schema.title: Category

parameters.description: Filter by category (subscription, food, salary, other)

schema.title: Response List Transactions Api Transactions Get

get.description:
Get a specific transaction by ID

Args:
    transaction_id: Transaction ID
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Transaction information
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if transaction not found

post.description:
Process billing for all due subscriptions on target date

Args:
    request: Billing process request with target date
    current_user: Current authenticated user (admin check could be added here)
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Billing result with success/failure details
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 422 for business logic errors, 500 for server errors

get.description:
Get billing alerts for upcoming charges within N days

Args:
    days: Number of days to look ahead (default: 7)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of billing alerts sorted by billing date
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 500 for server errors

parameters.name: days

schema.description: Number of days to look ahead for billing alerts
schema.title: Days

parameters.description: Number of days to look ahead for billing alerts

schema.title: Response Get Billing Alerts Api Billing Alerts Get

get.description:
Get total spending for a specific month

Args:
    year: Year
    month: Month (1-12)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Monthly spending statistics
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 422 for validation errors, 500 for server errors

Get spending grouped by category for a date range

Args:
    start_date: Start date
    end_date: End date
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Category spending statistics
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 422 for validation errors, 500 for server errors

Get total subscription spending for a specific month

Args:
    year: Year
    month: Month (1-12)
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Subscription spending statistics
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 422 for validation errors, 500 for server errors

Get asset distribution with percentages

Args:
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Asset distribution statistics with percentages
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: 500 for server errors
